2015-01-31.abstract: Honda Motor reports profit fell 22 percent in quarter ending December 2014, to 136 billion yen, or $1.15 billion, from year-ago quarter; cuts profit forecast for 2015 by more than $400 million due to costs associated with recalling four million cars with defective airbags made by Takata Corporation.
